nl.inl.blacklab.index

Class DocIndexerFactoryClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.index.DocIndexerFactoryClass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocIndexerFactory

    public class DocIndexerFactoryClass
extends Object
implements DocIndexerFactory
    Supports creation of several types of DocIndexers implemented directly in code. Additionally will attempt to load classes if passed a fully-qualified ClassName, and implementations by name in .indexers package within BlackLab.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface nl.inl.blacklab.index.DocIndexerFactory

      • isSupported

        public boolean isSupported(String formatIdentifier)
        Description copied from interface: DocIndexerFactory
        Can this factory instantiate a docIndexer for this type of format. This function will always be called prior to get().
        Specified by:
        isSupported in interface DocIndexerFactory
        Parameters:
        formatIdentifier - lowercased and never null or empty string
        Returns:
        true if this factory is able to create a docIndexer for the requested formatIdentifier
